page.title: 17Common illnesses,Stickney.
page.content: Most illnesses occur in wintertime and they are either bugs in the air or you catch them from other people.When a child has German measles,measles or chickenpox,he gets covered in spots. They sometimes itch.If you put calamine lotion on the spots it sometimes helps to stop the itching.Mumps is an illness where a child gets bumps on the glands on his neck .Sometimes your neck goes stiff and your throat hurts when you swallow. Colds are the most common illness,to be caught by a child.When you get wet or cold you can catch a cold,and also from other people.When you have a cold your nose is always runny,you sneeze alot,and it is a good idea to carry a handkerchief.Sometimes when you have a cold,you get a bad cough.
